column5: 2015 at university hospital in augusta. he was born in emanuel county
column6: a retired carpenter and store owner
column7: and a member of union grove united methodist church. funeral services will be at 2:00 p. m. monday at union grove united methodist church with burial to follow in the oak hill cemetery in millen. survivors include his daughter cathy e. bowen of swainsboro
